name: Beat Shooter (itch) (kora)
description:
This game is a survival style rhythm-shooter where you gain points by shooting incoming enemies of various colors. Will you make it to the end of the game?

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to Shoot/Change Directions, Space/Jump to Swap Colored Weapons

Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=10&v=d_mZS2X639I&embeds_euri=https%3A%2F%2Fmotionarray.com%2F&source_ve_path=MjM4NTE&feature=emb_title

Sound effects: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/explosion/
